item.title: Beyond $0$ and $\infty$: A solution to the Barge Entropy Conjecture
item.description: arXiv:2105.11133v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We prove the entropy conjecture of M. Barge from 1989: for every $r\in [0,\infty]$ there exists a pseudo-arc homeomorphism $h$, whose topological entropy is $r$. Until now all pseudo-arc homeomorphisms with known entropy have had entropy $0$ or $\infty$.
item.dc:creator: Jan P. Boro\'nski, Jernej \v{C}in\v{c}, Piotr Oprocha
